    • saveImage

      public java.util.concurrent.Future saveImage​(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService es, java.lang.Object o, java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi, long timeInMilliseconds, java.lang.String format, java.io.File f)

    • getHeadlessEnvironment

      public java.lang.Object[] getHeadlessEnvironment()
      Sets a system property (System.setProperty("java.awt.headless", "true");) and return a headless graphics environment and Toolkit of the system.
      Returns:
      Object[] r of size 2 where: r[0] = Toolkit.getDefaultToolkit(); r[1] = GraphicsEnvironment.getLocalGraphicsEnvironment().

    • logIfHeadless

      public void logIfHeadless​(java.awt.GraphicsEnvironment ge)
      Reports to std.out if ge is headless or not.
      Parameters:
      ge - GraphicsEnvironment

    • getDefaultFont

      public static java.awt.Font getDefaultFont()
      Returns:
      new Font("Arial", Font.PLAIN, 12);
